org.primaresearch.clc.phd.workflow

Interface Workflow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasChildActivities
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkflowImpl

    public interface Workflow
extends HasChildActivities
    Wrapper for an activity (root activity) with metadata and optional sub-workflows.
    Author:
    clc
